summary.span: Animates the value of a property between two target values using linear interpolation over a specified .

span.span: Animates the value of a property between two target values using linear interpolation over a specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 動畫經過一段時間更新屬性的值。An animation updates the value of a property over a period of time. 動畫效果可以是難以察覺的例如移動幾個像素為單位向左和右或明顯的例如同時微調並變更其色彩會放大 200 的時間成原始大小的物件。An animation effect can be subtle, such as moving a a few pixels left and right, or dramatic, such as enlarging an object to 200 times its original size while spinning it and changing its color. 若要建立動畫中的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，動畫關聯物件的屬性值。To create an animation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], you associate an animation with an object's property value. ## 目標值Target Values 類別會建立兩個目標值之間的轉換。The class creates a transition between two target values. 若要設定其目標值，請使用其， ，和屬性。To set its target values, use its , , and properties. 下表摘要說明如何， ，和可能使用屬性一起或分開來判斷動畫的目標值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的屬性Properties specified|產生的行為Resulting behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||動畫會從所指定的值屬性正在顯示動畫之屬性的基底值或前一個動畫的輸出值，根據前一個動畫的設定方式。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |動畫會從所指定的值屬性所指定的值為屬性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |動畫會從所指定的值屬性指定的總和值和屬性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||進展動畫的屬性的基底值的動畫，或前一個動畫的輸出所指定的值的值屬性。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||動畫會從正在顯示動畫之屬性的基底值或前一個動畫的輸出值，該值與所指定的值的總和屬性。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| > [!NOTE] > 如果您同時設定和屬性屬性會優先和屬性會被忽略。If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他的插補方法，或以動畫顯示兩個以上的目標值之間，使用物件。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. 將多個動畫套用至單一屬性的相關資訊，請參閱[主要畫面格動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md)。For information about applying multiple animations to a single property, see [Key-Frame Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md). ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features 因為類別繼承自，物件取得數個特殊的功能，包括下列： 它們可以宣告為多個物件之間共用，變成唯讀，以改善效能、 複製，和進行安全執行緒。Because the class inherits from , objects gain several special features, which include the following: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 如需有關所提供的不同功能物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

summary.span: Gets or sets the total amount by which the animation changes its starting value.

span.span: The total amount by which the animation changes its starting value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，當您想要製作動畫值，「 者 」 一定數量，而非指定的開始或結束值。Use the property when you want to animate a value "by" a certain amount, rather than specifying a starting or ending value. 您也可以使用屬性屬性。You may also use the property with the property. 下表摘要說明如何， ，和可能使用屬性一起或分開來判斷動畫的目標值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的屬性Properties Specified|產生的行為Resulting Behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||動畫會從所指定的值屬性正在顯示動畫之屬性的基底值或前一個動畫的輸出值，根據前一個動畫的設定方式。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |動畫會從所指定的值屬性所指定的值為屬性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |動畫會從所指定的值屬性指定的總和值和屬性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||進展動畫的屬性的基底值的動畫，或前一個動畫的輸出所指定的值的值屬性。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||動畫會從正在顯示動畫之屬性的基底值或前一個動畫的輸出值，該值與所指定的值的總和屬性。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| **請注意**如果同時設定和屬性屬性會優先和屬性會被忽略。**Note** If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他的插補方法，或以動畫顯示兩個以上的目標值之間，使用物件。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage <*object* `By`=""/><*object* `By`=""/> \-或-\- or - <*物件* `By`="{[X:null 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/ ><*object* `By`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加/減速函數可讓您建立各種不同的特製化的動畫效果包括彈跳、 彈簧振動和各種大小加速和減速動畫。Easing functions allow you to create a variety of specialized animation effects including bouncing, spring oscillations, and various magnitude acceleration and deceleration animations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表摘要說明如何， ，和可能使用屬性一起或分開來判斷動畫的目標值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的屬性Properties Specified|產生的行為Resulting Behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||動畫會從所指定的值屬性正在顯示動畫之屬性的基底值或前一個動畫的輸出值，根據前一個動畫的設定方式。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |動畫會從所指定的值屬性所指定的值為屬性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |動畫會從所指定的值屬性指定的總和值和屬性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||進展動畫的屬性的基底值的動畫，或前一個動畫的輸出所指定的值的值屬性。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||動畫會從正在顯示動畫之屬性的基底值或前一個動畫的輸出值，該值與所指定的值的總和屬性。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| **請注意**如果同時設定和屬性屬性會優先和屬性會被忽略。**Note** If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他的插補方法，或以動畫顯示兩個以上的目標值之間，使用物件。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage <*object* `From`=""/><*object* `From`=""/> \-或-\- or - <*物件* `From`="{[X:null 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/ ><*object* `From`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier Field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為**，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None|

summary.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the .

span.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the .

returns.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current animation.

span.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current animation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一個組合鏈結中，這個值會是快照集 （如果有的話） 或基底屬性的值，否則這個值會以鏈結中前一個動畫所傳回的值不是 。If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an that is not . `defaultDestinationValue`是基底值，如果動畫會在動畫的屬性上的第一個組合圖層中; 否則值是從上一個組合層次屬性的動畫的輸出值。The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果動畫只有其中一個的其， ，或屬性已設定，設定此屬性沒有任何作用。If the animation has only one of its , , or properties set, setting this property has no effect. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| > [!NOTE] > 這個相依性屬性並不常見，因為它的識別項欄位來自，並且可由各種衍生類別共用。This dependency property is unusual in that the identifier field for it comes from , and is shared by various derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsCumulative { get; set; }
.property instance bool IsCumulative
Public Property IsCumulative As Boolean
public: property bool IsCumulative { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.

value.span: **true**如果動畫會累加其值時其屬性造成動畫重複其簡單持續期間。

span.span: **true** if the animation accumulates its values when its property causes it to repeat its simple duration.
otherwise, **false**.
The default value is **false**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為**true**，動畫之輸出值只會累積時的動畫屬性造成動畫重複其簡單持續期間。When this property is set to **true**, the animation's output values only accumulate when the animation's property causes it to repeat its simple duration. 它不會累積它的值因為重複其父代重新啟動時，或它的時鐘已重新啟動從呼叫。It does not accumulate its values when it restarts because its parent repeated or because its clock was restarted from a call. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| > [!NOTE] > 這個相依性屬性並不常見，因為它的識別項欄位來自，並且可由各種衍生類別共用。This dependency property is unusual in that the identifier field for it comes from , and is shared by various derived classes.

The ending value of the animation.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表摘要說明如何， ，和可能使用屬性一起或分開來判斷動畫的目標值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的屬性Properties Specified|產生的行為Resulting Behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||動畫會從所指定的值屬性正在顯示動畫之屬性的基底值或前一個動畫的輸出值，根據前一個動畫的設定方式。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |動畫會從所指定的值屬性所指定的值為屬性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |動畫會從所指定的值屬性指定的總和值和屬性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||進展動畫的屬性的基底值的動畫，或前一個動畫的輸出所指定的值的值屬性。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||動畫會從正在顯示動畫之屬性的基底值或前一個動畫的輸出值，該值與所指定的值的總和屬性。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| **請注意**如果同時設定和屬性屬性會優先和屬性會被忽略。**Note** If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他的插補方法，或以動畫顯示兩個以上的目標值之間，使用物件。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage <*object* `To`=""/><*object* `To`=""/> \-或-\- or - <*物件* `To`="{[X:null 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/ ><*object* `To`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
